蔤字的基本解释

蔤
mì
藕。

蔤字的汉语字典释义

[①]［mì］
［《廣韻》美畢切，入質，明。］
亦作“藌1”。
荷的地下茎，俗称藕丝菜。

蔤字的康熙字典解释

【申集上】【艸字部】　蔤； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页1055第09
【唐韻】美畢切【集韻】莫筆切，?音密。荷本也。【爾雅·釋草】荷，芙蕖。其本蔤。【註】莖下白蒻在泥中者。【何晏·景福殿賦】茄蔤倒植。　又【集韻】覓筆切，音蜜。義同。或作藌、?。

蔤字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
蔤字的起名意思

暂无。

Tang
Basic explanation of words
Tang
mì
Lotus root.
Tang
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［mì］
["Guangyun" is beautiful, thorough and clear. ]
Also known as "Ming 1".
The underground stem of lotus is commonly known as lotus root vegetable.
Tang
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shen Ji 1] [Department of Zong Zi] 　蔤; Kangxi Strokes: 17; Page Number: Page 1055 Page 09
[Tang Yun] Meibiqie [Jiyun] Mobi cut, sound secret. He is also. 【Erya·Shucao】Lotus, lotus flower. Its essence. [Note] The white ball under the stem is in the mud. 【He Yan·Jingfu Palace Fu】The eggplant is planted upside down.　[Jiyun] Finding pen and cutting, sound honey. The same meaning. Or as Ming, ?.
